typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Types.Order storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Types.Order storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Types.Order storage ref)
struct Types.Order storage ref[] storage ref
struct Types.Order storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @dev allow deployer to withdraw all fees earned from escrow

params._amount: is the amount of USD to be transferred plus fees (18 decimals)
params._buyer: is the address of the customer
params._fee: is the amount of fees to be paid to the escrow to be minus from _amount (18 decimals)
params._orderType: is the type of order (0: buy, 1: sell)
params._rate: is the rate to buy usdc against customer fiat
params._seller: is the address of the vendor

setUsdcTokenAddress(address).details: allow deployer to update of USD Token contract address

params.usdcContractAddress: is the address of the chosen stabel currency to accepted Note use with caution, once a certain USD token is accepted changing will make the other USD token stuck

withdrawFeesEarned().details: allow deployer to withdraw all fees earned from escrow

usdcToken().notice: address of accepted USDC on deployed chain
